Question: Shenzhen Gosund Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Gosund Technology Co., Ltd

Smart Home Products

- Specializes in AI voice built-in technology and 2.4+5G dual-band technology
- Offers smart sockets, switches, bulbs, and home solutions in the IoT field
- More than 10 years of experience in smart home technology and product development
Summary_cn:
深圳市高特联科技有限公司

智能家居产品

- 专注于AI语音内置技术和2.4+5G双频技术
- 提供物联网领域的智能插座、开关、灯泡和家庭解决方案
- 在智能家居技术和产品开发方面拥有超过10年的经验
